## Value.asBoolean() method

Gets the value as a boolean.

The following values (case insensitive) are interpreted as true: "1", "true", "t", "yes", "y", "on". Other values are interpreted as false.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
asBoolean(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
